message: Starting Phase 3 review - gathering handover and task status
Checking agents.py and phases.py for read_registry_with_lock calls
Verifying state_db functions exist and checking dashboard API endpoints
Final verification - reviewing implementation against success criteria

Phase 3 Verification review completed. Verdict: APPROVED. All success criteria met - SQLite-first migration implemented correctly in agents.py and phases.py with proper fallback to JSON. Required state_db functions exist and SQL uses correct column names.
